dbscan¶

deepdrivemd.agents.stream.dbscan.cluster(cfg: deepdrivemd.agents.stream.config.OutlierDetectionConfig, cm_predict: numpy.ndarray, outlier_list: numpy.ndarray, eps: float, min_samples: int) → Tuple[float, int]¶

Run outliers_from_latent changing parameters of DBSCAN until the desired number of outliers is obtained.

Parameters

  • cfg (OutlierDetectionConfig) –

  • cm_predict (np.ndarray) –

  • outlier_list (np.ndaray) –

  • eps (float) –

  • min_samples (int) –

Returns

eps, min_samples which give the number of outliers in the desired range.

Return type

Tuple[float, int]

deepdrivemd.agents.stream.dbscan.dirs(cfg: deepdrivemd.agents.stream.config.OutlierDetectionConfig) → Tuple[str, str, str]¶

Create tmp_dir and published_dir into which outliers are written

Returns

paths to top, tmp and published directories

Return type

Tuple[str, str, str]

deepdrivemd.agents.stream.dbscan.outliers_from_latent(cm_predict: numpy.ndarray, eps: float = 0.35, min_samples: int = 10) → numpy.ndarray¶

Cluster the elements in the middle layer of CVAE.

Parameters

  • cm_predict (np.ndarray[np.float32]) – projections of contact maps to the middle layer of CVAE

  • eps (float) – DBSCAN’s eps

  • min_samples (int) – DBSCAN’s min_samples

Returns

indices of outliers

Return type

np.ndarray

deepdrivemd.agents.stream.dbscan.predict(cfg: deepdrivemd.agents.stream.config.OutlierDetectionConfig, model_path: str, cvae_input: numpy.ndarray, batch_size: int = 32) → numpy.ndarray¶

Project contact maps into the middle layer of CVAE

Parameters

  • cfg (OutlierDetectionConfig) –

  • model_path (str) –

  • cvae_input (np.ndarray) –

  • batch_size (int) –

Returns

Return type

np.ndarray

deepdrivemd.agents.stream.dbscan.project(cfg: deepdrivemd.agents.stream.config.OutlierDetectionConfig)¶

Postproduction: compute TSNE embeddings

deepdrivemd.agents.stream.dbscan.publish(tmp_dir, published_dir)¶

Publish outliers and the corresponding database for simulations to pick up

deepdrivemd.agents.stream.dbscan.read_lastN(adios_files_list: List[str], lastN: int) → Tuple[numpy.ndarray, numpy.ndarray]¶

Read lastN steps from each aggregated file. Used by project()

Parameters

  • adios_files_list (List[str]) – A list of aggregated adios files.

  • lastN (int) – How many last entries to get from each file

Returns

lastN contact maps from each aggregated file and lastN corresponding rmsds

Return type

Tuple[np.ndarray, np.ndarray]

deepdrivemd.agents.stream.dbscan.top_outliers(cfg: deepdrivemd.agents.stream.config.OutlierDetectionConfig, cvae_input: Tuple[numpy.array, numpy.array, numpy.array, numpy.array, numpy.array], outlier_list: numpy.array) → Tuple[numpy.array, numpy.array, numpy.array, numpy.array, numpy.array]¶

Find top num_sim outliers sorted by rmsd.

Parameters

  • cfg (OutlierDetectionConfig) –

  • cvae_input (Tuple[np.array, np.array, np.array, np.array, np.array]) – steps, positions, velocities, md5sums, rmsds

  • outlier_list (np.array) – indices corresponding to outliers

Returns

Positions, velocities, md5sums, rmsds, outlier indices of outliers, sorted in ascending order by rmsd

Return type

Tuple[np.array, np.array, np.array, np.array, np.array]

deepdrivemd.agents.stream.dbscan.wait_for_input(cfg: deepdrivemd.agents.stream.config.OutlierDetectionConfig) → List[str]¶

Wait for enough data to be produced by simulations.

Returns

a list of aggregated bp file

Return type

List[str]

deepdrivemd.agents.stream.dbscan.wait_for_model(cfg: deepdrivemd.agents.stream.config.OutlierDetectionConfig) → str¶

Wait for the trained model to be published by machine learning pipeline.

Returns

path to the model

Return type

str

deepdrivemd.agents.stream.dbscan.write_db(top, tmp_dir)¶

Create and save a database of outliers to be used by simulation

deepdrivemd.agents.stream.dbscan.write_pdb_frame(frame: numpy.ndarray, original_pdb: str, output_pdb_fn: str)¶

Write positions into pdb file

Parameters

  • frame (np.ndarray) – positions of atoms

  • original_pdb (str) – pdb file with initial condition to be used for topology

  • output_pdb_fn (str) – where to write an outlier

deepdrivemd.agents.stream.dbscan.write_top_outliers(cfg: deepdrivemd.agents.stream.config.OutlierDetectionConfig, tmp_dir: str, top: Tuple[numpy.ndarray, numpy.ndarray, numpy.ndarray])¶

Save to pdb files top outliers

Parameters

  • cfg (OutlierDetectionConfig) –

  • tmp_dir (str) – Temporary directory to write outliers to

  • top (Tuple[np.ndarray, np.ndarray, np.ndarray]) – top N positions, velocities, md5sums where N is equal to the number of the simulations.
